flawed_nl_solution:
He had 80-20=<<80-20=40>>40 after the donation
He kept 40/2=<<40/2=20>>20 after giving half to his brother
So he has 20*3=<<20*3=60>>60 coins
He then does 1 more donation and has 60-10=<<60-10=50>>50 coins left
#### 50

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 60, not 40. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
